entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
